segments.text: What does Human Resources Department do ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hiring , firing , training , insurances , benefits , retirement plans , salary , vacation .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: They take care of a lot of things .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But most of time , they provide assistances .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Say if the Engineering Department wants to hire a person , they will request HR to find candidates .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The Engineering Manager and his team will interview the candidates . HR will also be involved with the interview , but basically arranging the schedule and explaining the benefits .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Then the Engineering Manager will choose the candidate .
segments.speaker: S2
